mapper.update: update LF_Product_Test set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, category=#{category}, photourl=#{photourl}, lost_found_date=#{lost_found_date}, lost=#{lost}, feature=#{feature} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from LF_Product_Test order by seq
